tool_description: Monitors current market metrics against defined alert rules and identifies threshold breaches with context.

metric_names.description: Names corresponding to each metric value

rule_ids.description: Alert rule IDs to evaluate against

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: current_metrics and metric_names must have the same length.
Rule not found: One or more rule IDs do not exist.
No metrics provided: At least one metric value must be provided.
Invalid metric values: All metric values must be valid numbers.
usage: Provide current_metrics, metric_names, and rule_ids arrays. Returns evaluation results showing which rules were triggered.

triggered_rules.description: Array of rule IDs that were triggered

breach_details.description: Detailed descriptions of each threshold breach

total_rules_evaluated.description: Number of rules that were checked
